'''Hwaldar''' was a chieftain of the [[Hillmen]] of [[Rhudaur]]. Hwaldar was invented by [[Electronic Arts]] for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology|The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'' series.
